com.mapgroup.classificator.mail

Class MailSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.mail.MailSender

  • public class MailSender
extends java.lang.Object
    A support class which provides functionality in order to grant the possibility to send emails to some addressees.

    At the moment are supported only some mail server like:

    • Gmail
    • Yahoo
    • Alice
    • Outlook (with all the related mail addresses)

    • Method Detail

      • createAttachment

        private static void createAttachment(javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message,
                    MailDataTO struct,
                    java.lang.String attachmentName)
                              throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Add to the specified email message message an attachment which is represented by the file with name attachmentName.

        The current message is divided in two part, the first part will contain the email's body and the second the attachment chosen for the email.

        Parameters:
        message - email message raw structure
        struct - email data needed to send the email
        attachmentName - the name of the chosen attachment
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - - if some errors occurs during the message construction
        java.io.IOException - - if some errors occurs in creating the attachment

      • getRecipientsAddresses

        private static javax.mail.internet.InternetAddress[] getRecipientsAddresses(MailDataTO struct)
                                                                     throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException
        Returns an array of email addresses in the correct internet format taking them from the struct attributes.
        Parameters:
        struct - the structure which contains all the main email data
        Returns:
        the list of addressees in the correct internet address format
        Throws:
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - - if one of the specified address doesn't respect the internet standard

      • getServerMailName

        private static java.lang.String getServerMailName(MailDataTO struct)
        Retrieves from the sender's email address contained in the email data structure(struct) the specific server mail.

        Standing to the RFC internet format email address is based upon two important part: the local part and the domain part. This method grants the possibility to get from the domain part of the email address, the specific mail server to which the specified email address belong to.

        Parameters:
        struct - the email data structure
        Returns:
        the email address server mail

      • sendEmail

        public static void sendEmail(MailDataTO struct,
             java.lang.String attachmentName)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends an email using the data contained in the email data structure struct. If the email requires an attachment a file with the specified attachmentName was added to the mail.
        Parameters:
        struct - the email data structure
        attachmentName - the supplementary attachment filename
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - if some errors occurs while constructing and sending the email/s
